document.full_text: several euro zone finance ministers told ecb president jean-claude trichet in a conference call last week they have doubts greece will meet its fiscal targets and suggested athens restructure its debt, a magazine reported on saturday.
document.title: finance ministers, ecb disagree on greek restructuring: report
lines_and_colors: several euro zone finance ministers told ecb president jean-claude trichet in a conference call last week they have doubts greece will meet its fiscal targets and suggested athens restructure its debt, a magazine reported on saturday.
